actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee on the Judiciary. Hearings held.

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to make eligible for the Office of President a person who has been a United States citizen for 20 years.
popular_title: President and Vice President Eligibility for Office bill

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Makes eligible for President of the United States a person who has been a U.S. citizen for 20 years but who was not a native-born citizen of the Untied States.

titles.title: President and Vice President Eligibility for Office bill
A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to make eligible for the Office of President a person who has been a United States citizen for 20 years.
